title: fix: Only animate modals if they're not presented as `pageSheet` or `formSheet`
body:
Modals can have custom animations via `animations.showModal` or `animations.dismissModal`. This works fine for Modals presented in the following presentation style:

```
    overFullScreen
    overCurrentContext
    currentContext 
    popover 
    fullScreen
    none
```

but once you try animating modals with either `pageSheet` or `formSheet` presentation style, the animation goes crazy (goes beyond top, leaves blank see-thru area at the bottom)

This PR disables animation options for modals presented as page- or form-sheets to avoid this mistake. This means, for `pageSheet` and `formSheet` modals you cannot have custom content animations. Element transitions and Shared element transitions still work as expected.

title: [Breaking change] Remove layout.direction
body:
### Breaking change
`layout.direction` is no longer needed as we can use react-native's I18n to detect the direction.

**Examples**

Forcing the layout direction:
```js
I18nManager.forceRTL(true);
```

Syncing the layout direction with the system's direction:
```js
I18nManager.allowRTL(true);
```

title: Support shared element transition from screen to TopBar on Android
body:
This PR adds support for animating elements from a screen to a TopBar component during shared element transitions. Additionally it adds basic support to animating elements from a splash screen to the TopBar.

Currently, only images are supported in transitions involving the splash screen.

## TODO
- [ ] add documentation
- [ ] add another transition to TopBar during push
- [x] add splash screen example
